Module Contents

Classes

HealthDataPy

class healthdatapy.healthdatapy.HealthDataPy(base_url='https://www.who.int/data/gho/info/gho-odata-api')
get_data(endpoint, params=None)

Fetch data from the specified WHO GHO OData API endpoint.

clean_data(data)

Clean and preprocess the data fetched from the API.

aggregate_data(data, by)

Aggregate data based on specified criteria.

plot_data(data, plot_type='line')

Create a plot from the given data.

api_status_check()

Check the operational status of the WHO GHO OData API.
